Comments_List: Finishing Latin grammar and translating Cicero
Taking this course helped me be able to read real Latin text.
Perhaps moving at a faster pace in class

The class was challenging enough that it kept you responsible for keeping up to date with all the latin material.  Although it could be tedious to have vocabulary quizzes every week, only having to translate latin words to english made me lose incentive to really memorize that term like all the principle parts if it was a verb.
Yes, I love Latin and really enjoyed the Cicero we were assigned

Anyone who is going to take LATN 120 has been exposed to the language, so I would only recommend it if you actually enjoy Latin.  The class can be tedious if you are looking to fulfill a credit.  I like Latin and the puzzle translating provides so even when the work could be a lot, it was usually enjoyable to do.
